reviews.review_title: Bien situé, bon rapport qualité prix sans être le coup de foudre.
reviews.positive_text: Hôtel idéalement situé, facile à trouver, parking privatif facile d'accès, déco, couleurs assez contemporaines. 10mn à pied du centre historique. Petit déjeuner correct, même si l'attention au ravitaillement du buffet faiblit dès lors que l'on approche des horaires de fin de déjeuner. Personnel discret et non invasif. Equipement global correct, une réserve sur la ventilation et l'éclairage SDB inefficace. Buffet boissons chaudes en partie commune sympa.
reviews.negative_text: La chambre allouée (103) donne au dessus de l'entrée piétonne. Les chambres sont assez chaudes, de l'ordre de 23°, climatisation hors-service ne permettant pas de baisser la température, il nous a été conseillé d'ouvrir la fenêtre afin d'avoir moins chaud. La solution, compte-tenu des noctambules ou clients fumeurs de l'hôtel s'est révélée calamiteuse (bruits et odeurs de tabac jusqu'à 1h30/2h00 du matin. Le placement des produits petit-déjeuner est peu intuitif, il y a un peu de tout partout. Les "petites" marches à l'entrée de la chambre puis à l'entrée de la SDB, façon baguette d'angle alu sont malvenues, elle créent une double possibilité de chute (notamment la nuit en se rendant aux WC) et ne facilitent pas la tâche pour les valises roulantes.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.negative_text: Ménage chambre : quelques résidus (miettes ?)  sur la moquette et le drap

Nous avons reçu de la récéptionniste une très bonne adresse pour manger le soir, à 3 min à piéds de l'hôtel, la Brasserie Brunet où nous sommes retourné le lendemain aussi car c'était exquis.

reviews.review_title: Très bon séjour dans cet hôtel fiable et propre bénéficiant d’un parking privatif.
reviews.positive_text: Avant même notre arrivée dans la chambre le personnel de la réception a été arrangeant notamment en ce qui concerne le stationnement du véhicule dans le parking privatisé pour l’hôtel. Or c’est un vrai plus car se garer à Annecy en période touristique peut relever du sacerdoce. La chambre en elle-même était impeccablement propre, sanitaires compris. Les couloirs sont lumineux et agréables. Le petit-déjeuner est diversifié et s’ouvre également aux habitudes de nos amis étrangers non habitués aux croissants et autres brioches en proposant de la charcuterie et des fromages.
reviews.negative_text: En guise de suggestion et absolument pas à des fins de dénigrement : les oreillers mériteraient peut-être une sélection plus ambitieuse (encore que in fine nous avons vraiment bien dormi) et les viennoiseries du petit-déjeuner devraient peut-être là aussi être mieux sélectionnées.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

Cet hôtel est super bien situé ! C’était parfait. Le parking est top et nous avons pu tout faire à pied ! 
Concernant le personnel, il était au petit soin c’était super gentil. Ça a été un week-end de bonheur et le fait de loger dans un lieu agréable a permis de rendre ce week-end encore mieux ! :) donc merci au personnel.
reviews.negative_text: Le seul bémol qu’on a eu… à la limite c’est la taille de la chambre qui pour nous était étouffante (je souffre de clostrophobie) et la climatisation ne marchait pas. Donc on a eu très chaud aussi mais ça allait. Je pense qu’ils n’avaient pas encore activé les climatisations. Rien de plus normal pour un mois de mai encore « frais » :)

reviews.positive_text: Tout d’abord son emplacement car l’hôte est proche de tout, à 3 minutes à pied à peine du lac ou du vieux centre d’Annecy tout en étant dans un coin très calme en arrière lot d’une rue commerçante pas loin du cinéma. En plus, il est accessible en voiture sans difficulté ce qui est rare à Annecy avec une dépose minute au pied de l’hôtel et un parking en sous sol sécurisé en box individuel, pratique pour stocker la voiture, les bagages de rando et les vélos…. À l’intérieur l’hôtel réservé de belles prestations : qualité de la chambre, décoration, café et thé à volonté gratuit tout l’après-midi avec viennoiserie et bonbons…

reviews.review_title: Le service est de qualité pour le tarif, je ne regrette pas mon choix
reviews.positive_text:
L'accueil était parfait, le cadre de l'hôtel permet d'aller et de venir dans le centre d'Annecy à pieds, ce qui est agréable. La chambre double, economique, un poil petite, mais bien insonorisée, très propre, avec un petit bureau et une seule chaise (pour deux c'est dommage).
Le petit déjeuner, sous forme de buffet, est copieux et varié et tout à fait honorable pour le tarif.
Café et thé à volonté de 13 à 21h... 
Je ne regrette absolument pas mon sejour.
reviews.negative_text:
Lors de la reservation, le parking était pour moi un atout non negligeable, c'est apres reservation que j'ai eu un message de l'hôtel m'indiquant que la reservation du parking était à 12 euros. Un peu décue donc. 

J'ai des soucis importants de dos et le matelas est un matelas ressorts, ca ne m'a pas du tout convenu. 

CEPENDANT j'ai exposé ces deux problemes lors du paiement du sejour et l'hôte d'accueil à eu un geste commercial très appréciable.

Si vous êtes comme moi, peut-être faut -il vous renseigner sur la literie des chambres car je rappelle que nous avions la plus economique. 

Je recommande vivement cet hôtel.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Économique

La décoration est très jolie, les lits très confortables, la propreté impeccable. Et cerise sur le gâteau, le personnel est adorable, serviable et le petit-déjeuner au top. Un sans faute qui mériterait largement une étoile en plus.

reviews.review_title: Ideal pour un séjour à Annecy
reviews.positive_text:
Très bon accueil, personnel très souriant.
Très calme. Chambre de bonnes dimensions.
Très bien situé par rapport au vieux Annecy, donc idéal pour les visites et promenades.
Petit déjeuner varié et de qualité dans une salle très agréable.
Le café offert à volonté de 13h à 21h00 (avec viennoiseries et bonbons 😋)
Le parking (avec supplément) qui permet de laisser sa voiture dans de très bonnes conditions.

reviews.positive_text: Hotel rénové avec goût d’une propreté irréprochable. Situation géographique excellente, établissement idéalement placé entre la vieille ville et le lac d’Annecy. Le parking privé en box de l’hotel moyennant supplément était parfait pour nous. Petit déjeuner copieux avec de très bons produits, dans une belle salle avec coin salon agréable. Hôtel exceptionnel dans sa catégorie.
reviews.negative_text: Rien à mentionner.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text:
L’hôtel est propre, le petit déjeuner est parfait avec les produits frais et locaux, l’hôtesse de petit déjeuner est gentil, disponible et attentive, merci à elle. Les réceptionnistes nous avons bien accueillis, répondus à tout les questions et été gentil. 
L’hôtel est localisé près de la gare et beaucoup de bons restaurants, et le centre de ville est accessible au pied en 5 minutes. 
Il y a aussi les thé et café sont offert à partir de 13 h.
reviews.negative_text: Rien à dire
reviews.room_name: Chambre Économique

reviews.positive_text:
Personnel à l'écoute. Qui n'a pas hésité à prendre en compte mon handicap pour que je puisse accéder à ma chambre via l ascenseur. C est tellement rare! 
J'ai passé un très bon week-end et cet hôtel y a largement participé.

Encore merci

C’est faire bien peu de cas de sa clientèle. Je ne reviendrais plus.

L’hôtel est très proche de la gare et du lac donc très bien placé. Le personnel est très aimable et la chambre que j’ai occupée était toute neuve et avec une très jolie déco. Je recommande donc vivement cet établissement !
Je remercie sincèrement l’hôtel et son personnel pour avoir mis à disposition 1 douche et 1 serviette pour tous les coureurs du marathon (de l’hôtel) qui devaient rendre leur chambre le matin : très appréciable et fait avec beaucoup de gentillesse.

reviews.positive_text: Location was excellent, just a few minutes walk from the train station, and put us in a great location to walk around old town Annecy. The breakfast was good, if not overly elaborate and was the most fairly priced  of any of the hotels in which we’ve stayed this trip (6). The staff were very helpful, friendly and proficient in English. The room and other facilities were very well maintained. Lift was quite new and responsive.

reviews.review_title: Very nice hotel, quiet and clean

reviews.positive_text: The hotel is at very good location. The room was clean.

reviews.review_title: A pleasant hotel with an excellent restaurant right next door. Good location for exploring the town.  Good staff and ext

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel in the centre of the city yet costly
reviews.positive_text:
The hotel is very close to both the Centre ville and train station.
Rooms are very well maintained and the cleaning was impeccable.
reviews.negative_text:
The room is too small for the money we spend, this is not a cheap hotel and you can over hear the other rooms conversations. Some basic amenities like kettle, laundry bags are missing.
And the main disappointment was the check-in time which is 16h00. They don't allow early check-in even at 15h00.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Économique

reviews.review_title: Great location, but sleep deprived and disappointed.
reviews.positive_text: The amenities in the room were fine.
reviews.negative_text: Our room was too warm--like an oven--with no ability to control.  When we opened the windows, there was constant noise outside--truly, a party under our window and then the trash picked up very early.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text: Friendly staff good parking and central position in the town
reviews.negative_text: Could not understand why both heating and AC were both in operation at the same time lo

reviews.positive_text: Good location
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

reviews.positive_text: The location was excellent, a short walk from the train and bus stations and not too far to walk to the main attractions in Annecy. The room itself was very spacious and comfortable, with high quality fixtures and fittings throughout and a giant bed.
reviews.negative_text:
Admittedly we were there during a heatwave, but the AC didn't seem to work that well. The minimum temperature you could set it at was 22°C, but I'd be surprised if it ever actually got that low.
While I don't mind having a communal tea/coffee station instead of facilities in the room, I thought it was a bit cheeky not to allow them to be used until the afternoon. Presumably this is done to encourage people to buy tea or coffee from the restaurant in the morning, but for the price we paid I would expect better than this. It is for this reason alone that my review is a 7 rather than an 8.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double Privilège

reviews.negative_text: Lack of tea/ coffee making facilities in the room. However, there was a communal drinks machine on the landing which was open from 1pm- 9pm.

reviews.review_title: Annecy is a lovely town to visit and hotel is well positioned. The criticisms above were not a big deal but one has to c
reviews.positive_text: Very good position. Quality fixtures and fittings. Thoughtful and modern interior design. Quality breakfast. Refurbed rooms recently.
reviews.negative_text: No frills at all. Complimentary water would be nice. No safe, no fridge, no tea and coffee making in room. Tea etc was available on first floor in the afternoon. If you need parking make sure you book, only 4 places available but are very secure.

reviews.positive_text: nice hotel, clean room, walking distance to city centre, rich breakfest, all fine

reviews.positive_text: Excellent location, in the centre, close to train station. Only a short walk to get to the lake,too. Room was clean and comfy and (most of the time) quiet . In the afternoon there were croissants,tea, coffee available for guests which was very nice. We would go back!
reviews.negative_text: Unfortunately on Saturday night the nearby park became very noisy with drunk/loud people so we hardly got any sleep.. but other than this everything was ok!
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text: Nice room nice decor. Very comfortable room close to the old town and train station
reviews.negative_text: For a 4 star hotel a few extra bits in the bathroom would have been better

reviews.positive_text: Location, clean, comfortable bed and room
reviews.negative_text: Air conditioning was not an option until June
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

reviews.positive_text: The breakfast was excellent. We also really appreciated being able to make a tea or coffee and have a snack at the table they set up in the afternoon/evening.  A good bar downstairs plus seating outside (this was mainly for smokers but we enjoyed sitting there as usually quiet).  A very good location as near the station but handy to the town as well.
reviews.negative_text: Although we booked several months earlier and chose fully refundable accommodation, we were charged a one night deposit straight away.  When I enquired, I was told several times that this was because it was high season and we wouldn’t get our money back if we canceled.  While I understand it is the busy time of year, I believe the hotel was wrong to do so as it was in breach of the terms of our booking. It should have been made clear before we submitted our booking that a non-refundable deposit was required.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

reviews.positive_text: breakfast is OK. newly decorated. location is good.staff friendly and helpful.
reviews.negative_text: room layout is odd(maybe just my room is odd.). small room.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text: The room met our expectations for size and facilities. Good location and parking available
reviews.negative_text: The room next door was very noisy slamming doors and it was with such force that the radiator in our room clanged/vibrated each time - unpleaseant.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

reviews.positive_text: Excellent location, quiet but still in the new part of the town. A ten minute wlak to the old town. Private Garage parking for our Motorcyle, so important to us. Close to the railway station. A delightful Market is in the old town on fridays.
reviews.negative_text: Annecy seems to be very pricey as a location. The local traffic is horrendous and mostly gridlocked. It took 40 minutes to travel the final 5km into the town.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

reviews.negative_text: No Tea and coffee facilities in the room although there is complimentary coffee and pastries in the afternoon.

a) Hot water not always available - there was some issue, therefore the water was often luke warm
b) There were no hooks in the bathroom to hang clothes

Tea/Coffee were available on the staircase landing from 1pm - 9pm but not in the room. The beverages were usually not hot.

reviews.review_title: I loved staying at Allobroge Park and would gladly stay again.
reviews.positive_text: The location is 5 minutes walk from the old city.  The room and hallways are fashionably decorated and clean.  The breakfast had a nice spread of fruit, coffee/tea, croissants, granola, cereal, cold cuts and cheese, whole-grain bread and jams and eggs which can be boiled as you like.  I especially liked that there were individual little dishes for spooning your choice of jam into.  (Less cross contamination.)  I also liked that there was coffee/tea available between breakfast and dinner.

reviews.positive_text: Location
reviews.negative_text: Shower did not work in room 214. Water gurgled and bubbled up from the drain constantly throughout the day. There was a large gap, approx 4 ml, between rubber seal on door and base which allowed water to flow out all over bathroom floor. See photos. I wish there was a way to upload video of the constant noise and outflow from the gurgling, bubbling drain. I used multiple towels to sop it up. Reported to staff but issued was not resolved. Staff brushed it off saying, “It’s an old building.” I was told that an alternate room was not going to be available until 4 pm, and I would have to repack my luggage and store it all day, so I would be completely without the use of my room for my one full day in Annency.  Tried to shower twice but had to cut it short to avoid water outflow. Impossible to enjoy my stay. A fully functioning shower is the LEAST one can expect from a 200 Euro per night hotel room. Staff were dismissive. I am still awaiting a response from manager “Alex.”  ABSOLUTELY DO NOT RECOMMEND.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Économique

reviews.review_title: Best of both world! Near to the Central Station and the Old Town
reviews.positive_text:
The location couldn't have been any better - best of both worlds! Why we say that? It's because it's very close to the central train station and the bus terminals, hence convenient when taking public transportation, for example we have arrived from Geneva by train. But it's also super close to the main attractions including the Old Town - by foot it's less than 5 minutes. 
Surrounding areas are great for shopping, eating out and talking a walk. Hotel itself is very clean and modern. Rooms are super conformable, cozy and fitted with modern amenities. Stuffs are friendly and helpful. It's a great value for money  and we would definitely recommend and come back again.
reviews.negative_text:
We liked everything about the stay, hence, no complains. 
Would have liked it even better if the rooms had a mini refrigerator but we were allowed to use the common one at the reception bar area.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text: Decor in the room and reception areas nice and facilities are clean.
reviews.negative_text:
1. The air quality is a problem. The air conditioners are disconnected currently. because it is not necessary this time of year, to cool things down, they say! So one cannot control the temperature of the room. plus, it seems, no fresh air or filtered oxygen-rich air is coming into the rooms! This is really worrying, in winter especially, because of flu and Covid viruses circulating! The only option to guests is to put the radiators on or off for heat! Or if you feel too hot or stuffy, to open the windows, which then brings the street noise up into your bedroom, enough not to sleep well at all!  
We tried to speak to the receptionist/front of house lady, who then called her male colleague to speak to us. They did not apologise for our discomfort, but he in particular, kept trying to defend the hotel's decision to disconnect the aircon! We believe it is a cost consideration and not an environmental one! Also, it is currently warmer than in November normally.
2. There are no kettles in the rooms! So for your first cup of morning coffee, you need to go to the breakfast room to collect it. Even if you do not want to eat the full buffet breakfast for 12 euros per person from 6.30am. Otherwise there is room delivery service at a cost, but from a later hour than 6.30am. A free coffee/tea station is however available on the first floor in the late afternoon until 9pm. So not for the morning period when they serve a paid for breakfast in the breakfast room. 
This hotel seems to be very patronising and dictatorial in its approach! :-(:-(
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text:
The hotel is a 5 min wall to the train and bus station. It is one block off of the main street so was very quiet. The hotel and our room  was tastefully decorated, modern and seemed newly remodeled. From this central location you can walk to Lake Annecy, old town, to restaurants and shops and historic sites. The receptionist was very helpful and offered a local favorite restaurant that was within walking distance and was one of our best 
meals!  We appreciated the complimentary espresso, coffee, tea and pastries offered from 1-9 pm each day.  The hotel offers breakfast but we did not partake so cannot comment. Highly recommend this hotel and will stay here again on our next visit!

Mal, dass wir dieses Hotel ausgewählt haben, vor allem wegen der Lage in der Altstadt , (trotzdem erstaunlich ruhig) und der Möglichkeit, eine abschließbare Garage zu mieten, so dass wir nicht das Urlaubsgepäck von 4 Wochen mit auf das Zimmer nehmen mußten. reviews.review_title: Tranquilo pero vergonzosa la gestión de la garantía de pago
reviews.positive_text: La ubicación y la tranquilidad
reviews.negative_text: Encuentro vergonzoso que para garantizar el pago hagan lo que llaman una preserva. A la entrada te dicen que solo es un bloqueo del importe de la habitación, que quedará liberado en cuanto pagues a la salida. En realidad te cargan 2 VECES el importe de la habitación hasta que desbloquean el primero. Llevo 5 días esperando la devolución del primer cargo!!!! Mira que hay maneras de garantizar el pago que no impliquen dos cargos! Por qué presumen mi solvencia? Y si necesito ese dinero esos días?? De vergüenza!!!
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

Wer sich nicht mit diesen Pollern gewähnt ist, wird Mühe haben reinzufahren. Frühstück zu teuer für was es gibt. Auf der Strasse für 4-5 euro pro Person Kaffe, Sandwich, Kuchen, Orangensaft.

reviews.positive_text: da localização , da limpeza, da qualidade das roupas de cama e banho
reviews.negative_text:
Do estacionamento . Apesar de ser próximo , a explicação dada para chegar ao local foi confusa e o funcionário do hotel esqueceu de nos dar o cartão para abrir o bloqueio da rua do estacionamento e para abrir a porta da garagem . Isso causou  grande transtorno e irritação. Perdemos muito tempo e tivemos que pedir ajuda na rua pois acreditávamos que o cartão da porta do quarto era também para uso na garagem já que não haviam nos dado outro. 
Quando voltamos para o hotel o funcionário estava rindo muito e disse que esqueceu de nós dar o cartão. 
Como havia apenas uma pessoa na portaria do hotel, não recebemos nenhum tipo de ajuda com as malas que precisavam ser descarregadas  rapidamente para depois levar o carro para a garagem.

reviews.review_title: Sauber, kompakt - perfekt für 1-2 Nächste auf der Durchreise
reviews.positive_text:
Super zentrales Hotel, perfekt für ein-zwei (Durchfahrts-)Übernachtungen. 
Direkte Anbindung zu einer Parkgarage (12 Euro pro Nacht). 
Sehr sauber & zeckmäßig. 
Wir haben das kleinste Zimmer gebucht, da wir hier wirklich nur geschlafen haben - alles sauber, kompakt und genauso wie man es braucht. Allerdings haben wir uns zu zweit nur einen Handgepäckskoffer geteilt - für mehr ist definitiv kein Platz.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Économique

reviews.positive_text: Un hotel central, absolut minunat! O echipa de oameni prietenoși și zâmbitori!! Curățenie exemplară și un mic dejun fabulos!

reviews.review_title: Hotel che ha superato le mie aspettative
reviews.positive_text: L'hotel gode di una ottima posizione per chi deve visitare il centro storico, si trova infatti a sole due travese dalla zona pedonale del centro. E' facilmente raggiungibile in macchina seguendo le indicazioni del navigatore ed ha una ampia disponibilità di parcheggi coperti riservabili in fase di prenotazione.  Dentro e fuori si presenta molto bene (probabilmente è stato ristrutturato recentemente). La camera era molto silenziosa, con una buona distribuzione degli spazi e prevista di prese USB A e C per la ricarica dei telefoni. Personale molto cordiale e pulizia impeccabile. Comoda la possibilità di prendere gratuitamente nel pomeriggio/sera un the o caffè nella postazione dedicata.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Économique

reviews.review_title: Opção excelente e charmosa em Annecy
reviews.positive_text: Excelente opção em Annecy. Gostamos das instalações modernas, muito funcionais com uma decoração alegre. Cama e colchão muito bons. Limpeza primorosa não apenas no quarto e banheiro, mas em todo hotel. Nota-se muito cuidado e zelo na manutenção das instalações. A maquina de café com alguns agradinhos durante a tarde toda, são muito acolhedores. Estacionamento fácil (necessita reservar). A recepção cuidou de tirar fotos dos detalhes de local e controles de acesso para bem explicar. Localização excelente, praticamente a 200 metros do centrinho. O acesso ao Jardim do lago pode ser feito a pé. Café  da manhã de excelente qualidade apesar de variedade um pouco limitada.
reviews.negative_text: Nada que tire o brilho desse excelente hotel, mas para citar algo sugerimos uma melhoria na instalação do buffet do café da manhã. O local não é grande e com facilidade fica meio congestionado. Mas pode ser melhorado com uma disposição mais logica dos itens oferecidos e uma sinalização que evite os hóspedes ficarem tentando achar o que buscam. Uma barra de segurança no box do banheiro seria bom também, em especial para os hóspedes idosos.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text: Ficamos apaixonados pelo hotel! Melhor hotel que ficamos durante nossa viagem!!!

reviews.positive_text: Özellikle resepsiyon görevlisi oldukça nazikti. Odanın ve banyonun temizliği gayet iyiydi. Yataklar rahattı. Mobilyalar yeniydi. Belli saatler arasında ücretsiz çay-kahve imkanının olması bizi mutlu etti. Özellikle konumu, gara yakın olması nedeniyle harikaydı.
reviews.negative_text: Kalorifer petekleri az ısıtıyordu. Çok olmasa da biraz üşüdük diyebilirim. Bunun dışında eleştireceğim bir şey yok.

reviews.positive_text:
El hotel no puede estar mejor situado: a 2 minutos de la estación de tren y a 5 del centro de la ciudad, en una zona bastante animada con restaurantes, cafés, tiendas, etc. La habitación nos pareció muy cómoda, limpia y tranquila y el personal del hotel fue en todo momento encantador.
Se puede alquilar una plaza de parking por 12€/día y puedes dejar el coche el día del checkout hasta las 14h. Un toque que nos gustó fue que en el primer piso del hotel a partir de las 13h dejan dulces, café y té para que los huéspedes se sirvan.
El desayuno es bueno, tiene tanto opciones saladas como dulces, a destacar la selección de quesos, cereales y pan.
reviews.negative_text: No es que no me gustase pero sí que mejoraría la calidad de la charcutería del desayuno (ejemplo: jamón separado por papelitos de film) y me hubiera gustado que hubiera más frutas donde elegir.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Standard

提供行李寄存服务，服务态度不错。

reviews.positive_text: Hotel bardzo dobrze zlokalizowany, z łatwym dojazdem. Zameldowanie bardzo sprawne. Pokój elegancko urządzony w bardzo dobrym standardzie, z bardzo wygodnym łóżkiem i dobrym oświetleniem. Łazienka z dużym prysznicem, wygodna i funkcjonalna. Wszystko czyściutkie i nowe. Śniadanie bardzo dobre i obfite w równie ładnej jadalni. Super patent na samodzielne gotowanie jajek. Parkowanie w garażu podziemnym w zamkniętych boksach garażowych.

reviews.positive_text: Hotel nuovo e vicino al centro. Colazione ottima, tutto fresco e pulito. La camera di buone dimensioni e pulita, così come il bagno e gli asciugamani.  Non ho trovato comodissimo letto ma chi viaggiava con me invece si.. Purtroppo in tutta la Francia ho trovato anche d'estate i piumini pesanti in camera: dormendo con l'AC ad una temperatura "normale", il peso è eccessivo e fa caldo, oppure bisogna dormire scoperti. Ah il bagno non ha il wc alla francese separato.

reviews.review_title: Soggiorno molto piacevole a due passi dal centro
reviews.positive_text:
Posizione ottima, a meno di 10 minuti a piedi dal centro storico.
Camere moderne, silenziose e pulite, il bagno è ampio con una doccia molto grande.
Nel pomeriggio a disposizione caffè e tè.
Parcheggio  a pagamento estremamente comodo con box singoli da riservare al momento della prenotazione.
Personale gentile e disponibile.
Annecy è una città molto bella, pittoresca con possibilità di numerose attività lungo il lago e tantissimi ristoranti per la cena
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

reviews.positive_text:
Es un hotel pequeño precioso muy bien ubicado en Annecy. Esta en una zona preciosa del centro, sobre una calle lateral muy tranquila.
Habitación pequeña pero muy cómoda y completa.
Tiene parking muy cómodo al lado.
Tomamos el desayuno buffet que es más que recomendable con variedad de Quesos y fiambres franceses .
Ofrecen café y té durante todo el día.
Personal muy amable

reviews.review_title: Комфортное проживание в рамках соотношения цена/качество для человека, путешествующего на автомобиле
reviews.positive_text: Прекрасное расположение отеля относительно исторического центра города.  При это отель находится в тихом переулке. Аналогичное расположение для шоппинга, хотя меня это не интересовало. Номер средней ценовой категории, оборудованный всем необходимым для комфортного проживания на 1-2 ночи. Удобная собственная парковка в отеле для автомобиля любого стандартного размера. Для авто среднего размера - закрытый гараж, для крупных легковых авто и внедорожников - открытая собственная стоянка. Жалобы на тесную парковку, которые е встречал в некоторых отзывах абсолютно необоснованны. Простой заезд по Google Maps от автомагистрали.
reviews.negative_text: Несколько неудобен порог в санузел.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double ou Lits Jumeaux Classique

3. מיקום נהדר לעיר העתיקה, לאגם, לרחובות של קניות.
4. חניה צמודה ונוחה במחיר נוח.

reviews.review_title: Sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt in sehr guter Lage
reviews.positive_text:
Das Privilege Doppelzimmer war wirklich sehr geräumig. Alles ist sehr sauber und jeder vom Personal sehr freundlich. Konnten uns ein sehr gutes Restaurant empfehlen, das auch am Sonntag Abend bei unserer Ankunft geöffnet hatte.
Hatten in der Buchung bei Zusatzinformationen angegeben, dass wir einen Parkplatz reservieren/buchen möchten. Haben in kürzester Zeit eine Email-Nachricht vom Allobroges Park Hôtel mit der Bestätigung erhalten und bei unserer Ankunft einen Parkplatz im Hotelgelände zugeteilt bekommen. Kommt aber wohl auf die Größe des Autos an, ob man einen der Parkplätze im Hof erhält. Wir wurden beim Check-in danach gefragt.
Das Frühstück war hervorragend! Große Auswahl, frisch, sehr schön angerichtet. 
Die Lage ist wie beschrieben. Es liegt fußläufig zur Altstadt, zum Hafen, dem Park und dem Schloss von Annecy. 
Das Hotel ist sicherlich wieder unsere Wahl beim nächsten Aufenthalt in Annecy.
reviews.room_name: Chambre Double Privilège
